briefTitle: Sequencing Of Endocrine Therapy In Post-Menopausal Women With Early Breast Cancer (FAST)
officialTitle: Sequencing Of Endocrine Therapy In Post-Menopausal Women With Early Breast Cancer (FAST) a Non-interventional Trial With Aromasin®
conditions: Post Menopausal Women With Early Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change From Baseline in International Breast Cancer Study Group (IBCSG) Linear Analogues Self-Assessment (LASA) Quality of Life (QoL) Core Questionnaire Scores
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Early Breast Cancer, post-menopausal, 2-3 yrs adjuvant tamoxifen therapy.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Not applicable.
